documents.document: I want to get up early to work out before rehearsal tomorrow. And I ALSO want to get up early to go eat waffles. So torn over here, folks.
On my walk home from the rehearsal hall every night I pass the Chemainus theatre all lit up 🎉✨ https://t.co/s1GfV6t3Je
@WhiskayeFilms 100% agree. I just can't handle Trump claiming his racist beliefs are Christian. Muslim does not mean extremist. Period.
@realDonaldTrump Stop pretending you have Christian values. There are endless numbers of Christians who cannot believe you are in power
Day off in Chemay https://t.co/gf5Ol4pg7s
So tired & sad that Christianity is associated with right-wing politics. What is happening is not Christian. It is not of love. It is fear.
I've got my rehearsal pencil ooooh ya https://t.co/BHrDhP5QWa
Tomorrow's my 1st day of Pride and Prejudice rehearsal & right now I'm listening to music for Bard on the Beach designs. Good things ahead❤️
The last moments before long distance again! ❤️😢
Just saw a well-dressed businessy man yell "get a real job" at a bus driver. For telling him he locked his bike in the way of buses. Um😡
All of the posts about the marching today are beautiful and inspirational. Proud proud proud. #nastywoman #notmypresident
@Cassandra_Actor i totally know what is happening and why this is being posted
My DND character Meryl Sheep just died :(
@letsgotothemall spoiled this bride to be with a beautiful #katespade planner. She knows me well. https://t.co/2ZNp02phzv
Every time I show my ring to someone I hold my breath and hope they don't say "man you have hairy fingers for a blonde girl"
guest lists for weddings UGH AM I RITE
Not sure whether to hate or admire the man on the bus repeatedly shout-asking "why does it smell so much like chicken and broccoli?! Why?"

#VALENTINES. Hey lovelies!
Want to purchase a handmade Valentine made with poetry, maps, or… https://t.co/gSTUDYQrCA
When you have a piano but your Vancouver home is small so you visit it in a storage unit. https://t.co/IyCGw9Q42G
#Vancouver finally feels like home to me. Peaceful Coal Harbour walk to clear my head and say bye before going away… https://t.co/rQ5jLWI52L
Unexpected tweet about avocados
@EvanFrayne lovely work on Fighting Season. ❤️❤️
An old man asked me for directions at the airport and I accidentally lied and led him astray and it's all I can think about I AM SO SORRY
And allllso super stoked to do my first show at @ChemainusThtr! Getting my British on :)
Can't wait to get my pjs on and catch up on all my cult documentaries.
HOW are nuts still not only allowed on some flights, but *handed out* on them!???
Salt Lake City: you have some very nice moving sidewalks. Good job. I had a quick but great time.
Will I make my connecting fliiiiiiiight? #airportsoundtrack
Self care matters. You matter. Love on yourself. Love on your anxious friends. Fearlessly break the stigma to do with mental illness.
Um @PeterNChrisShow KILLED IT at @SFSketchfest tonight. Killed. It. Excuse me as I pee myself laughing.
For those of you who were wondering, yes Chris seems to approve of the engagement @imchriswilson https://t.co/BvmZIzUklA
ACT San Fran. When you run into theatres just by accident. 😊 https://t.co/jjQ2SZ94mv
Podcats? Podcasts by cats? About nice cat things?
The sad thing about podcasts is I feel like I just hung out w fun close friends but when it's done I realize they didn't hang out w me :(
Bc I'm short I have so much anxiety just before boarding flights, worried about how dumb I'll look trying to get stuff in overhead bins
Went in for a kiss and Peter did the mannequin challenge to me. thaaaaaanks babe
@Delta awesome, thanks! Just wanted to make sure it was valid and not something that would be an issue.
@Delta Online checkin and tho I booked my name written correctly (Julie Patricia), my name is listed as juliepatriciams. Is that right? Thx
SAN FRAN BDAY TOMORROW
Butt dialled my employer this morning and woke up to the small "hello?? ....HELLO?" of her voice coming from my bed. Nice Julie.
Making super rough list to see how bad making a wedding guest list is gonna be. Some of you have to become enemies for me to help me out thx
Oh! Now it's 22 year old @ivandecker in SPY episode
Other good wifi names I just read: OldYeller69, candycorn, outermet, aggressiveitalian

I love telling my phone to connect to wifi as I'm on the bus to read the weird names.
Mommasbroccoli2 I totally saw you
@AdamPateman you are **23** in the episode I'm listening to! Muppet baby!
I'm listening to a Stop Podcasting Yourself ep from 2008 and they just did a shout out to you @sarabynoe and said you were their 1st fanmail

"Why are you fighting?" "She won't call me Queen Christmas!!"
Ah yes. Clearly a big problem. #nannylyfe
It is important to know that some brands of ice cream sandwiches are 10/10 and others are definitely only a 6/10.
I just really want to go play bingo with some friends. What is so wrong with that?
@LuvgvsUwngs your support of Mariah was so evident and as a person of faith I appreciate how you poured out live for the gay community!
#Weddingplanning weird blog titles "How to decorate with seemingly useless ladders"
I'm pretty sure that opening and using a brand new box of crayons feels even better than it probably should.
#coffee https://t.co/1UIPu2Kc60
ONE MONTH AGO I got my wisdom teeth out and my face is STILL bruised.
Maaaaan she is so poised and articulate while talking important things. https://t.co/Uvx106WQM5
I have had a very busy evening vacuuming salt from my front entryway.
Those breaking news stories about not using q-tips are really getting around eh
So far my film typecast is either scared woman or caffeinated woman. Pretty sure. https://t.co/rd5ZfndtJ6
@Wendys my fiancé @PeterCarlone is your no. 1 fan. Will you sponsor our wedding meal??? #neverhurtstoask #weddingplanning #vancouverweddings
I, like many other newyearnewme people, have redownloaded the duolingo ap
Would having a blog about wedding planning while fighting an anxiety disorder be interesting? Or lame?
I follow more beagles than people on Instagram
Rum and coke and Scientology docs. Oooooh Ya.
Do I have any friends in Chicago? @PeterNChrisShow are there this weekend just to make you laugh! Lucky ducks.
The fact that I could buy my wedding dress on Amazon if I wanted to makes me feel weird.
Me: Hey A, can you help me carry some of these bags please? A: I'm only 4 my arms are only strong to carry teddy bears and candy
@erikrolfsen @theprovince @PeterCarlone this is where I take the kids to school!!!
I go back & forth whether I want kids, but do know I want to NAME some kids. Mail me your kid w return address/stamp & I'll name & send back
@PeterCarlone remember when you told me if I was a dino I'd be a triceratops and I was so disappointed
Excuse me I am just busy purchasing all of the cardigans at the thrift store
Thrift shop til your head plops off
@CuteKidVines @CuteOverloads @PeterCarlone watch it
Finally came up with my New Years resolution: unsubscribe from all the emails that drive me nuts
The effort it takes for me to not say "I KNOW I READ THE SIGN" to salespeople telling me things are 40% off is verrrrry high right now
@ChrisKingMD perhaps! But if it is, then I have a feeling I am maybe doing my job as a nanny incorrectly haha

Nanny kid playing: "It's slippery. Be careful driving. Don't crack your head on the road."
Vancouver should maybe get roads cleared now?

2 year old points to zit on my face: "You are dirty."
Feeling good about 2017 being my power woman year
I left a half hour early for work and yet I am still standing here waiting for my first bus... Glad I bought the large coffee this morning!
We just youtubed dogs sneezing for quite a while #futurehusb
"Sometimes I don't feel bad for pandas becoming extinct because it doesn't seem like they try very hard" -@PeterCarlone
"All I want in life is a dog that sounds like a human when it sneezes" -@PeterCarlone
Drinking coffee at TIFFANYS because I am classy https://t.co/ECXHP8INb0
Finally got Blundstones. Here's to a dry feet 2017.
Have you ever been really tipsy in a Tiffanys before?? This fiancée has!!!
@PeterCarlone IM KING OF THE OGRES
So happy to have these photo gems from Teen Angst Night run by @sarabynoe - the evening is… https://t.co/kq5jDjtFwQ
I can tell the neighbours are making brunch because they keep singing the line about five dozen eggs from the Gaston song
@ImChrisWilson glad you made it back to TO!! https://t.co/oDs47qvsPm
Starting 2017 right by having a marathon of The Office. So basically nothing has changed! Woo
My Italian FIANCÉ is making me spaghetti woo ❤️❤️
New Year's Eve migraine baby
@AmitaiMars @BrianFukushima miss vickies planet?
Our bus driver is a CHAMP. Bad weather: other driver didn't get to us. He's saving us & we don't have to sleep in a Revelstoke gas station
The fastest way to make me sad, is to see a sad old man. There's one waiting to find out what to do bc the bus is full. My INFJ heart hurts.
Only 12.5 hours left on the bus!!!
@conradbelau was it creepy to do? I want to do it
@kylaferrier ps I spent awhile trying to decide if "minded" was a word and if the past tense word was actually "mound"
@kylaferrier so technically I said okay EVEN THOUGH SHE DIDNT ASK
@kylaferrier she didn't ask!!! She reached across and plugged it in while talking on her phone, and I said "uh... Ooook"
